00025 /*
00026  * lustre/lod/lod_sub_object.c
00027  *
00028  * LOD sub object methods
00029  *
00030  * This file implements sub-object methods for LOD.
00031  *
00032  * LOD is Logic volume layer in the MDS stack, which will handle striping
00033  * and distribute the update to different OSP/OSD. After directing the updates
00034  * to one specific OSD/OSP, it also needs to do some thing before calling
00035  * OSD/OSP API, for example recording updates for cross-MDT operation, get
00036  * the next level transaction etc.
00037  *
00038  * Author: Di Wang <di.wang@intel.com>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00042 
00043 #include <obd.h>
00044 #include <obd_class.h>
00045 #include <lustre_ver.h>
00046 #include <obd_support.h>
00047 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00048 
00049 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00050 #include <lustre_param.h>
00051 #include <md_object.h>
00052 #include <lustre_linkea.h>
00053 #include <lustre_log.h>
00054 
00055 #include "lod_internal.h"
00056 
00057 struct thandle *lod_sub_get_thandle(const struct lu_env *env,
00058                                     struct thandle *th,
00059                                     const struct dt_object *sub_obj,
00060                                     bool *record_update)
00061 {
00062         struct lod_device       *lod = dt2lod_dev(th->th_dev);
00063         struct top_thandle      *tth;
00064         struct thandle          *sub_th;
00065         int                     type = LU_SEQ_RANGE_ANY;
00066         __u32                   mdt_index;
00067         int                     rc;
00068         ENTRY;
00069 
00070         if (record_update != NULL)
00071                 *record_update = false;
00072 
00073         if (th->th_top == NULL)
00074                 RETURN(th);
00075 
00076         tth = container_of(th, struct top_thandle, tt_super);
00077 
00078         /* local object must be mdt object, Note: during ost object
00079          * creation, FID is not assigned until osp_object_create(),
00080          * so if the FID of sub_obj is zero, it means OST object. */
00081         if (!dt_object_remote(sub_obj) ||
00082             fid_is_zero(lu_object_fid(&sub_obj->do_lu))) {
00083                 /* local MDT object */
00084                 if (fid_is_sane(lu_object_fid(&sub_obj->do_lu)) &&
00085                     tth->tt_multiple_thandle != NULL &&
00086                     record_update != NULL &&
00087                     th->th_result == 0)
00088                         *record_update = true;
00089 
00090                 RETURN(tth->tt_master_sub_thandle);
00091         }
00092 
00093         rc = lod_fld_lookup(env, lod, lu_object_fid(&sub_obj->do_lu),
00094                             &mdt_index, &type);
00095         if (rc < 0)
00096                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00097 
00098         /* th_complex means we need track all of updates for this
00099          * transaction, include changes on OST */
00100         if (type == LU_SEQ_RANGE_OST && !th->th_complex)
00101                 RETURN(tth->tt_master_sub_thandle);
00102 
00103         sub_th = thandle_get_sub(env, th, sub_obj);
00104         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00105                 RETURN(sub_th);
00106 
00107         if (tth->tt_multiple_thandle != NULL && record_update != NULL &&
00108             th->th_result == 0)
00109                 *record_update = true;
00110 
00111         RETURN(sub_th);
00112 }
00113 
00129 int lod_sub_object_declare_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00130                                   struct dt_object *dt,
00131                                   struct lu_attr *attr,
00132                                   struct dt_allocation_hint *hint,
00133                                   struct dt_object_format *dof,
00134                                   struct thandle *th)
00135 {
00136         struct thandle *sub_th;
00137         bool record_update;
00138 
00139         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00140         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00141                 return PTR_ERR(sub_th);
00142 
00143         if (record_update)
00144                 update_record_size(env, create, th, lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00145                                    attr, hint, dof);
00146 
00147         return dt_declare_create(env, dt, attr, hint, dof, sub_th);
00148 }
00149 
00166 int lod_sub_object_create(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00167                           struct lu_attr *attr,
00168                           struct dt_allocation_hint *hint,
00169                           struct dt_object_format *dof,
00170                           struct thandle *th)
00171 {
00172         struct thandle     *sub_th;
00173         bool               record_update;
00174         int                 rc;
00175         ENTRY;
00176 
00177         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00178         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00179                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00180 
00181         if (record_update) {
00182                 rc = update_record_pack(create, th,
00183                                         lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00184                                         attr, hint, dof);
00185                 if (rc < 0)
00186                         RETURN(rc);
00187         }
00188 
00189         rc = dt_create(env, dt, attr, hint, dof, sub_th);
00190 
00191         RETURN(rc);
00192 }
00193 
00206 int lod_sub_object_declare_ref_add(const struct lu_env *env,
00207                                    struct dt_object *dt,
00208                                    struct thandle *th)
00209 {
00210         struct thandle  *sub_th;
00211         bool            record_update;
00212         int             rc;
00213         ENTRY;
00214 
00215         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00216         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00217                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00218 
00219         if (record_update)
00220                 update_record_size(env, ref_add, th, lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu));
00221 
00222         rc = dt_declare_ref_add(env, dt, sub_th);
00223 
00224         RETURN(rc);
00225 }

00419 int lod_sub_object_declare_insert(const struct lu_env *env,
00420                                   struct dt_object *dt,
00421                                   const struct dt_rec *rec,
00422                                   const struct dt_key *key,
00423                                   struct thandle *th)
00424 {
00425         struct thandle *sub_th;
00426         bool            record_update;
00427 
00428         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00429         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00430                 return PTR_ERR(sub_th);
00431 
00432         if (record_update)
00433                 update_record_size(env, index_insert, th,
00434                                    lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu), rec, key);
00435 
00436         return dt_declare_insert(env, dt, rec, key, sub_th);
00437 }
00438 
00455 int lod_sub_object_index_insert(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00456                                 const struct dt_rec *rec,
00457                                 const struct dt_key *key, struct thandle *th,
00458                                 int ign)
00459 {
00460         struct thandle *sub_th;
00461         int             rc;
00462         bool            record_update;
00463 
00464         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00465         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00466                 return PTR_ERR(sub_th);
00467 
00468         if (record_update) {
00469                 rc = update_record_pack(index_insert, th,
00470                                         lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu), rec, key);
00471                 if (rc < 0)
00472                         return rc;
00473         }
00474 
00475         return dt_insert(env, dt, rec, key, sub_th, ign);
00476 }

00524 int lod_sub_object_delete(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00525                           const struct dt_key *name, struct thandle *th)
00526 {
00527         struct thandle  *sub_th;
00528         bool            record_update;
00529         int             rc;
00530         ENTRY;
00531 
00532         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00533         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00534                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00535 
00536         if (record_update) {
00537                 rc = update_record_pack(index_delete, th,
00538                                         lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu), name);
00539                 if (rc < 0)
00540                         RETURN(rc);
00541         }
00542 
00543         rc = dt_delete(env, dt, name, sub_th);
00544         RETURN(rc);
00545 }

00689         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00690                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00691 
00692         if (record_update) {
00693                 rc = update_record_pack(attr_set, th, lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00694                                         attr);
00695                 if (rc < 0)
00696                         RETURN(rc);
00697         }
00698 
00699         rc = dt_attr_set(env, dt, attr, sub_th);
00700 
00701         RETURN(rc);
00702 }

00801         bool            record_update;
00802         int             rc;
00803         ENTRY;
00804 
00805         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00806         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00807                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00808 
00809         if (record_update)
00810                 update_record_size(env, write, th,
00811                                    lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00812                                    buf, pos);
00813 
00814         rc = dt_declare_write(env, dt, buf, pos, sub_th);
00815 
00816         RETURN(rc);
00817 }

00835 ssize_t lod_sub_object_write(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00836                              const struct lu_buf *buf, loff_t *pos,
00837                              struct thandle *th, int rq)
00838 {
00839         struct thandle  *sub_th;
00840         bool            record_update;
00841         ssize_t         rc;
00842         ENTRY;
00843 
00844         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00845         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00846                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00847 
00848         if (record_update) {
00849                 rc = update_record_pack(write, th, lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00850                                         buf, *pos);
00851                 if (rc < 0)
00852                         RETURN(rc);
00853         }
00854 
00855         rc = dt_write(env, dt, buf, pos, sub_th, rq);
00856         RETURN(rc);
00857 }

00913 int lod_sub_object_punch(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt,
00914                          __u64 start, __u64 end, struct thandle *th)
00915 {
00916         struct thandle  *sub_th;
00917         bool            record_update;
00918         int             rc;
00919         ENTRY;
00920 
00921         sub_th = lod_sub_get_thandle(env, th, dt, &record_update);
00922         if (IS_ERR(sub_th))
00923                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(sub_th));
00924 
00925         if (record_update) {
00926                 rc = update_record_pack(punch, th, lu_object_fid(&dt->do_lu),
00927                                         start, end);
00928                 if (rc < 0)
00929                         RETURN(rc);
00930         }
00931 
00932         rc = dt_punch(env, dt, start, end, sub_th);
00933 
00934         RETURN(rc);
00935 }
00936 
00937 int lod_sub_prep_llog(const struct lu_env *env, struct lod_device *lod,
00938                       struct dt_device *dt, int index)
00939 {
00940         struct lod_thread_info  *lti = lod_env_info(env);
00941         struct llog_ctxt        *ctxt;
00942         struct llog_handle      *lgh;
00943         struct llog_catid       *cid = &lti->lti_cid;
00944         struct lu_fid           *fid = &lti->lti_fid;
00945         struct obd_device       *obd;
00946         int                     rc;
00947         bool                    need_put = false;
00948         ENTRY;
00949 
00950         lu_update_log_fid(fid, index);
00951 
00952         rc = lodname2mdt_index(lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, (__u32 *)&index);
00953         if (rc < 0)
00954                 RETURN(rc);
00955 
00956         rc = llog_osd_get_cat_list(env, dt, index, 1, cid, fid);
00957         if (rc != 0) {
00958                 CERROR("%s: can't get id from catalogs: rc = %d\n",
00959                        lod2obd(lod)->obd_name, rc);
00960                 RETURN(rc);
00961         }
00962 
00963         obd = dt->dd_lu_dev.ld_obd;
00964         ctxt = llog_get_context(obd, LLOG_UPDATELOG_ORIG_CTXT);
00965         LASSERT(ctxt != NULL);
00966         ctxt->loc_flags |= LLOG_CTXT_FLAG_NORMAL_FID;
00967         ctxt->loc_chunk_size = LLOG_MIN_CHUNK_SIZE * 4;
00968         if (likely(logid_id(&cid->lci_logid) != 0)) {
00969                 rc = llog_open(env, ctxt, &lgh, &cid->lci_logid, NULL,
00970                                LLOG_OPEN_EXISTS);
00971 
00972                 /* re-create llog if it is missing */
00973                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
00974                         logid_set_id(&cid->lci_logid, 0);
00975                 else if (rc < 0)
00976                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00977         }
00978 
00979         if (unlikely(logid_id(&cid->lci_logid) == 0)) {
00980                 rc = llog_open_create(env, ctxt, &lgh, NULL, NULL);
00981                 if (rc < 0)
00982                         GOTO(out_put, rc);
00983                 cid->lci_logid = lgh->lgh_id;
00984                 need_put = true;
00985         }
00986 
00987         LASSERT(lgh != NULL);
00988 
00989         rc = llog_init_handle(env, lgh, LLOG_F_IS_CAT, NULL);
00990         if (rc != 0)
00991                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
00992 
00993         if (need_put) {
00994                 rc = llog_osd_put_cat_list(env, dt, index, 1, cid, fid);
00995                 if (rc != 0)
00996                         GOTO(out_close, rc);
00997         }
00998 
00999         ctxt->loc_handle = lgh;
01000 
01001         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: Init llog for %d - catid "DOSTID":%x\n",
01002                obd->obd_name, index, POSTID(&cid->lci_logid.lgl_oi),
01003                cid->lci_logid.lgl_ogen);
01004 out_close:
01005         if (rc != 0)
01006                 llog_cat_close(env, lgh);
01007 out_put:
01008         llog_ctxt_put(ctxt);
01009         RETURN(rc);
01010 }
